info.title: Service Test Management
info.description: This is Swagger UI environment generated for the TMF Service Test Management specification

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma separated properties to display in response

"PROACTIVE" or "ONDEMAND" mode

post.description: Sets the communication endpoint address the service instance must use to deliver information about its health state, execution state, failures and metrics.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Data containing the callback endpoint to deliver the information

delete.description: Resets the communication endpoint address the service instance must use to deliver information about its health state, execution state, failures and metrics.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the registered listener

ServiceTest.description:
A service test is an entity that exists that exists for a controlled test invocation on a service. The service 
test is executed according to a schedule and contains service test configuration parameters that are to be 
applied at execution time, and service test measures that result.

endDateTime.description: The end date and time of the service test

href.description: Hyperlink to access the service  test

id.description: The identifier of the service test

mode.description:
An indication of whether the service test is running in 
"PROACTIVE" or "ONDEMAND" mode

name.description: The name of the service test

startDateTime.description: The start date and time of the service test.

state.description: The actual state the service test is in

ServiceTest_Create.description:
A service test is an entity that exists that exists for a controlled test invocation on a service. The service 
test is executed according to a schedule and contains service test configuration parameters that are to be 
applied at execution time, and service test measures that result.
Skipped properties: id,href

mode.description:

"PROACTIVE" or "ONDEMAND" mode

name.description: The name of the service test

startDateTime.description: The start date and time of the service test.

state.description: The actual state the service test is in

ServiceTest_Update.description:
A service test is an entity that exists that exists for a controlled test invocation on a service. The service 
test is executed according to a schedule and contains service test configuration parameters that are to be 
applied at execution time, and service test measures that result.
Skipped properties: id,href,id,href

endDateTime.description: The end date and time of the service test

mode.description:
An indication of whether the service test is running in 
"PROACTIVE" or "ONDEMAND" mode

name.description: The name of the service test

startDateTime.description: The start date and time of the service test.

state.description: The actual state the service test is in

ServiceTestSpecification.description:
The service test specification describes the service test in terms of parameters to be configured and 
measures to be taken.

description.description: Description of a service test specification.

href.description: Hyperlink to access a service test specification.

id.description: Identifier of a service test specification.

name.description: Name of a service test specification.

validFor.description: A valid duration of a thing.

description.description: Description of a service test specification.

name.description: Name of a service test specification.

RelatedServiceRef.description: The service of the service test

name.description: A name to describe a service.

RelatedServiceTestSpecificationRef.description: The service test specification used by the service test.

href.description: Hyperlink to access a service test specification.

id.description: Identifier of a service test specification.

TestMeasure.description:
A TestMeasureDefinition specifies a measure of a specific aspect of a product, service, or resource test, 
such as lost packets or connectivity status.

accuracy.description: The number of digits of accuracy captured for Metrics associated

caputureDateTime.description: The date and time that capture the metric.

caputureMethod.description:
"The method used to capture the Metrics. 
Note: This may be replaced by a set of entities similar to the 
Performance Monitoring Ref.

metricHref.description: Hyperlink to access a metric for detail information.

unitOfMeasure.description:
The unit of measure for the metric values, such as meters, 
cubic yards, kilograms [ISO 1000].

value.description:
The value of Metric in the test. This also could be a documents 
to record all values got during the service test.

valueType.description:
A kind of value that the Metric value associated with a 
metricValue can take on, such as numeric, text, and so forth.

ServiceTestCharacteristic.description: The configuration of the service test is set by the service test characteristic.

MeasureThresholdRuleViolation.description:
A measureThresholdRuleViolation is a violation of a rule that defines the in the 
MericDefMeasureThresholdRule.

conformanceTargetLower.description:
A value used to determine if the threshold is crossed or ceases 
to be crossed. It represents the lower limit. The value should be less than the conformanceTargetUpper. The conformance comparators should also be logically defined so as to not lead to a logically impossible condition.

conformanceTargetUpper.description:
A value used to determine if the threshold is crossed or ceases 
to be crossed. It represents the Upper limit. The value should be greater than the conformanceTargetLower. The conformance comparators should also be logically defined so as to not lead to a logically impossible condition.

conformanComparatorLower.description:
An operator that when applied on a value specifies whether a 
threshold is crossed or ceased to be crossed. This operator is used to compare with the conformanceTargetLower.

conformanComparatorUpper.description:
An operator that when applied on a value specifies whether a 
threshold is crossed or ceased to be crossed. This operator is used to compare with the conformanceTargetUpper.

numberOfAllowedCrossing.description:
The number of allowed crossing occurrences in reference to the 
tolerancePeriod without a consequence being initiated.

thresholdRuleSeverity.description:
A threshold can be generated in different severity levels. A 
crossing for each level may require a different condition and possibly trigger a different consequence.

tolerancePeriod.description:
An interval of time of allowed crossing occurrences before a 
consequence being initiated.

AppliedConsequence.description:
An Applied Consequence defines the action (prescribed action or notification) to take when a 
MeasureThresholdRuleViolation occurs.

appliedAction.description:
The action for a violated threshold. This could be a hyperlink to 
the action.

description.description: A narrative that explains in detail what the consequence is.

name.description:
A word, term, or phrase by which Consequence is known and 
distinguished from other MetricDefMeasureConsequences.

repeatAction.description:
An indicator use to specify that a consequence should cease 
being applied if a value is in the same range as the previous value or continue being applied if a value is in the same range as the previous value.  
If the repeatAcation is True, if the consequence is always applied as soon as the MetricMeasure value is in the range of values and if the repeatAcation is False, the consequence is applied only if the previous MetricMeasure value wasn't in the same range.

TimePeriod.description: A base / value business entity used to represent a period of time between two timepoints.

startDateTime.description: An instant of time, starting at the TimePeriod

endDateTime.description: An instant of time, ending at the TimePeriod.

TestMeasureDefinition.description:
A TestMeasureDefinition specifies a measure of a specific aspect of a product, service, or resource test, 
such as lost packets or connectivity status.

captureFrequency.description:
The frequency of capture for the metric. Note: This may be 
replaced by a set of entities similar to the Performance Monitoring.

captureMethod.description:
The method used to capture the Metric. Note: This may be 
replaced by a set of entities similar to the Performance Monitoring.

metricHref.description: Hyperlink to access a metric for detail information.

metricName.description: The name of a metric that in the test measure.

unitOfMeasure.description: Name of a service test specification.

valueType.description:
A kind of value that the Metric value can take on, such as 
numeric, text, and so forth.

validFor.description: A valid duration of a thing.

id.description: The identifier of a service specification.

MetricDefMeasureThresholdRule.description:
A MetricDefMeasureThresholdRule is a rule that defines the condition (raise or clear) to achieve to apply 
consequences when a threshold is crossed or ceased to be crossed. It also defines the severity of the 
raise or clear of the threshold.

conformanceTargetLower.description:
A value used to determine if the threshold is crossed or ceases 
to be crossed. It represents the lower limit. The value should be less than the conformanceTargetUpper. The conformance comparators should also be logically defined so as to not lead to a logically impossible condition.

conformanceTargetUpper.description:
A value used to determine if the threshold is crossed or ceases 
to be crossed. It represents the Upper limit. The value should be greater than the conformanceTargetLower. The conformance comparators should also be logically defined so as to not lead to a logically impossible condition.

conformanComparatorLower.description:
An operator that when applied on a value specifies whether a 
threshold is crossed or ceased to be crossed. This operator is used to Service Test Management API REST Specification compare with the conformanceTargetLower.

conformanComparatorUpper.description:
An operator that when applied on a value specifies whether a 
threshold is crossed or ceased to be crossed. This operator is used to compare with the conformanceTargetUpper.

numberOfAllowedCrossing.description:
The number of allowed crossing occurrences in reference to the 
tolerancePeriod without a consequence being initiated.

thresholdRuleSeveri ty.description:
A threshold can be generated in different severity levels. A 
crossing for each level may require a different condition and possibly trigger a different consequence.

tolerancePeriod.description: A String. An interval of time of allowed crossing occurrences before a consequence being initiated.

MetricDefMeasureConsequence.description:
A MetricDefMeasureConsequence defines the action (prescribed action or notification) to take when a 
MetricDefMeasureThresholdRule is crossed.

description.description: A narrative that explains in detail what the consequence is.

name.description:
A word, term, or phrase by which a 
MetricDefMeasureConsequence is known and distinguished from other MetricDefMeasureConsequences.

prescribeAction.description:
Recommended remedy for a violated threshold. This could be 
the hyperlink to the action.

repeatAction.description:
An indicator use to specify that a consequence should cease 
being applied if a value is in the same range as the previous value  or continue being applied if a value is in the same range as the previous value.   
If the repeatAcation is True, if the consequence is always applied as soon as the MetricMeasure value is in the range of values and if the repeatAcation is False, the consequence is applied only if the previous MetricMeasure value wasn't in the same range.

validFor.description: A valid duration of a thing.

code.description: An integer coding the error type. This is given to caller so he can translate them if required.

message.description: A short localized string that describes the error.

description.description: (optional) A long localized error description if needed. It can contain precise information about which parameter is missing, or what are the identifier acceptable values.

infoURL.description: (optional) A URL to online documentation that provides more information about the error.
